body:
Hey! I would like to let you all know that earlier today I earned prestige 1.
Thanks to all of you who I have fought over the past few months, and whoever hasn't fought me I look forward to it.
Here is my video about my prestige:

http://youtu.be/BbaOD6INsgQ

Thanks :D

-Lego


 (I had to make a new thread because I archived the other)

title: Its Has Happened. Prestige Level 1.

replies.body: But spammy and I'm sure someone's is gonna quote the rules... I do believed I have already comgradulated you but Congratchumalations  anyways

replies.body: gratz and sorry if i am the Debby downer here, but isn't this considered spam.  tell me if i am wrong.

replies.body: Congratulations! Don't see reason for it to marked as "spam". From my knowledge spam means Stupid Pointless Annoying Message and this is just you celebrating your achievement!
